alert.note: Alert for Northern St. Tammany; Southwestern St. Tammany (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 1:50PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central St. Tammany Parish through 215 PM CDT... At 150 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Abita Springs, or near Covington, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Covington, Abita Springs and Lacombe. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 12 between mile markers 64 and 76. Interstate 59 in Louisiana near mile marker 10. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern St. Tammany; Southwestern St. Tammany
